options.content:
The panels will update on different intervals. 
Please see [Data Refresh Intervals](https://avalara.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/AVATECH/pages/638415603972/Salesforce+Monitoring#Data-Refresh-Intervals) for more details.

panels.description: Source Code Management repository.
panels.title: SCM Link

panels.description: The # of open incidents against each Salesforce org.
panels.title: Salesforce Incidents

alert.message:
<!channel> ALERT: A Salesforce Incident has been opened against ${environment}

Dashboard: https://metrics.platform.avalara.io/d/edqq6je4aevb4b/salesforce-monitoring?orgId=1
alert.name: Salesforce Incidents Alert

panels.description: The # of open incidents against each Salesforce org over time.
panels.title: Salesforce Incidents Over Time

panels.title: Incidents details

panels.title: Maintenance details

panels.description: The usage percentage for each API.
panels.title: Salesforce API Usage %

alert.message:
<!channel> ALERT: Salesforce API usage is over 90% for ${limit_name}

Dashboard: https://metrics.platform.avalara.io/d/edqq6je4aevb4b/salesforce-monitoring?orgId=1
alert.name: Salesforce API Usage % Alert

panels.description: API limits in Salesforce refer to the maximum number of API requests that can be made to a Salesforce instance over a period of time.
panels.title: Salesforce API Usage %

panels.description: Monitor Default and Active billing fields for CyberSource (CC) and CyberSource (ACH) payment gateways
panels.title: Check Payment Gateway status

alert.message:
<!channel> ALERT: Payment Gateway status changed in FullQA

Please review details under section "Observe Payment Gateway Status change for FullQA" on Dashboard: https://metrics.platform.avalara.io/d/edqq6je4aevb4b/salesforce-monitoring?orgId=1

user_name: {{ .CommonLabels.user_name }}
payment_gateway_name: {{ .CommonLabels.payment_gateway_name }}
record_id: https://avalara--fullqa.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/blng__PaymentMethod__c/{{ .CommonLabels.record_id }}/view
alert.name: Salesforce Payment Gateway status change alert

panels.description:
Monitor Default and Active billing fields for CyberSource (CC) and CyberSource (ACH) payment gateways.
Fields must be 'false' at any time.
panels.title: Payment Method using Valid Payment Gayeways in FullQA

alert.message:
<!channel> ALERT: Active Billing field for Payment method changed in FullQA

Please review details under section "Observe Payment Gateway Status change for FullQA" on Dashboard: https://metrics.platform.avalara.io/d/edqq6je4aevb4b/salesforce-monitoring?orgId=1

user_name: {{ .CommonLabels.user_name }}
gateway_name : {{ .CommonLabels.billing_payment_gateway_name}}
payment_method_name : {{ .CommonLabels.payment_method_name}}
record_id: https://avalara--fullqa.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/blng__PaymentMethod__c/{{ .CommonLabels.record_id }}/view
alert.name: Salesforce Alert for Active Billing Payment Methods in FullQA

panels.description:
Monitor Active billing field for payment methods in FullQA.
Active billing field must be 'false' at any time.
panels.title: Payment Method where Active billing is True

panels.description: Payment Gateway status change details

defaults.noValue: No change in Payment Gateway status

targets.expr: label_replace(count by(billing_active_status, billing_default_status, billing_gateway_type, payment_gateway_name, record_id, user_name, last_modified_date) (payment_gateway_status{billing_active_status!="N/A"}), "last_modified_date", "$1", "last_modified_date", "(.+)\\.[0-9]+\\+[0-9]+")

panels.title: Details of Payment method using valid payment gateway

panels.description:
Monitor records if Active billing is True for Payment methods.
Active billing must be False at any time.

defaults.noValue: No change in Payment Gateway status

targets.expr: label_replace(count by(billing_active_status, billing_autopay_status, billing_payment_gateway_name, payment_gateway_token, payment_method_id, payment_method_name, user_name, last_modified_date) (payment_method_status{billing_active_status!="N/A"}), "last_modified_date", "$1", "last_modified_date", "(.+)\\.[0-9]+\\+[0-9]+")

panels.title: Active billing Payment Method Status Overview
Full QA - Payment Gateway and Method Status

panels.description: User licenses in Salesforce define the baseline level of features and permissions that a user can access within the Salesforce environment, determining what apps, objects, and functionalities are available to them based on their assigned license type.
panels.title: User Licenses Usage %

panels.description: Active Licenses details
panels.title: User Active Licenses Count (Used vs Total vs Percentage Utilized)

panels.description: Usage-based entitlements licenses in Salesforce are licenses that track and limit the consumption of specific features or services based on usage metrics, such as API calls or storage, rather than per-user allocations.
panels.title: Usage based entitlements Usage %

panels.description: Usage based entitlements Licenses details
panels.title: Usage based entitlements Licenses Count(Used vs Total)

panels.description: Licenses to grants access to additional features or permissions beyond the standard Salesforce license. It allows administrators to assign specific sets of permissions to users on top of their existing user license, enabling more granular control over feature access and customization.
panels.title: Permission Set License Usage %

panels.description: Permissionset Active Licenses details
panels.title: Permissionset Licenses Count (Used vs Total)

options.content:
# GitLab Deployment Metrics

Please refer to the [Hex report](https://app.hex.tech/avalara/app/55b1430d-a9e3-4eaf-a227-6e4f766daf55/latest?) to view comprehensive metrics for the complete GitLab deployment pipeline.

The deployment metrics in this Grafana dashboard show the deployment metrics from Salesforce. Salesforce deployment metrics include GitLab deployments, Change-Sets, and Package Installs.

They do not include the entire GitLab deployment process, which includes validations/check-only deployments for Apex packages. This process optimizes the deployments for Apex.

Validation metrics are not included in this Grafana dashboard, but they are included in the Hex report for Apex deployments.

panels.title: Production Average Deployment Time vs Average Pending Time

panels.description: Deployment annotations from GitLab pipeline events made in the Grafana time range.
panels.title: Production Deployment Annotations

panels.description: Deployment annotations from GitLab pipeline events made in the Grafana time range.
panels.title: Full QA Deployment Annotations

panels.description: Deployment annotations from GitLab pipeline events made in the Grafana time range.
panels.title: Common Dev Deployment Annotations

panels.description: Monitors and lists users who query more than 10,000 records in Salesforce

targets.expr: count by (entity_name, method, query_type, rows_processed, user_id, user_name) (${interval}_user_querying_large_records)

panels.title: List of users querying large (>10k) records (${interval})

panels.description: Monitors and lists users exporting Reports

defaults.noValue: No Report was exported in Last hour

panels.title: List of users exporting Reports

panels.description: Count of possible suspicious activities from Audit Trail logs
panels.title: Number of suspicious activities

panels.description: Count of possible suspicious activities from Audit Trail logs

defaults.noValue: No Audit Trail log captured for selected Interval

panels.title: Count of possible suspicious activities from Audit Trail logs

panels.description: List of possible suspicious activities from Audit Trail logs

defaults.noValue: No Audit Trail log captured for selected Interval

targets.expr: label_replace(count by (action, section, user, created_date, display, delegate_user) (suspicious_records), "created_date", "$1", "created_date", "(.+)\\.[0-9]+\\+[0-9]+")

panels.title: List of possible suspicious activities from Audit Trail logs

list.name: page_app_name
list.query: LightningSalesConsole, LightningService, PSA_Project_Manager, LightningSales, Collections_Management, CAM_Lightning, Customer_Excellence, PSA_Consultant, Ava2_GoLive_Lightning, Loyalty_Lightning, all, Service, Composer, ProdlyMoover_Lightning, Avalara_Sales_Q2C, Billing_Management, ZoomClean, BETA_Avalara_Service_Support_Console, PSE_Operations, Community, Chatter, QuotetoCash_Q2C, LicenseManagementApp, Distribution_Engine, PSA_PMO, Avalara_Sales_Admin_Q2C, iSell_for_Salesforce, LinkedIn_Admin_Portal, Edit_Quotas, Partner_Order, CventLightningApp, NEO_Collections_Management, Excise_Tax_Division, Compliance, FFCentral, CSM_Lightning, QuotetoCash, OnlineSales, ZoomInfo, CameleonCPQ, SalesforceBillingConfiguration, Setup, ConnectorForce_Management, DocuSignForSalesforceCore, DocuSign_for_Salesforce_CPQ, Marketing_Operations, Activity_Management, Skilljar, Continuous, FieldPro
